paramobject.name: ProcessSections
paramobject.description: List of Process Sections under the Sub System Definition

paramobject.name: ProcessSection
paramobject.description: A Process Section Definition. This is the Top level of the Process hierarchy.

paramobject.name: TaskRef
paramobject.description: Reference of the Task being executed

paramobject.name: Enabled
paramobject.description: Enables or Disables the Process Section
